channel.title: Future Events on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning
channel.description: Recent content in Future Events on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning

item.title: Steering Committee Meeting
item.description: There will be NO regular meeting in September. The original committees from Tama and Toledo, and others who wish to join the effort, are invited to meet and discuss organization, priorities, and next steps. This meeting will be held in the large meeting room near the back of the Tama Civic Center to avoid potential conflicts with events at the Wieting Theatre. Agenda specifics: To be announced at a later date.

item.title: Golf Cart Tour - South Tama Rec Trail
item.description: Ever been interested in discovering the South Tama Rec Trail and learning more about the trail and future plans? Well, on Wednesday, September 28, we will provide a golf cart tour of the South Tama Rec Trail for individuals age 50 and older who cannot comfortably walk the trail. Interested adults may join us between Noon and 3pm at either the Tama Civic Center or Toledo Heights Park for a golf cart ride on the trail.

item.title: Walking Audit - Tama
item.description: Earlier in the year we had a very successful “Walking Audit” in Toledo. Now it’s Tama’s turn. On September 15 we have planned a Walking Audit   around downtown Tama conducted by an experienced representative from Wellmark’s Healthy Hometown   initiative. The flyer you see below is from our Toledo walking audit. More details for Tama will be posted as soon as they are available.
